column5: Master of Science (M.Sc.) in Advanced Materials and Nanotechnology    Graduate students are awarded the M.Sc. degree in Advanced Materials and Nanotechnology after successfully completing the required programme of study and successfully defending and writing their M.Sc. thesis.
